terms.definition: This specifies the particular set of laws (usually of a state or country) that will be used to interpret and enforce the terms of a contract.
This phrase is used at the end of a legal document to signify that the parties are signing it to confirm their agreement to its terms.
This is a contract that outlines the terms and conditions between a client and an individual or company hired to perform a specific job as an independent contractor, not an employee.
This word is often used in contracts, typically following 'WHEREAS' and 'THEREFORE,' to transition into the operative clauses where the parties' agreements are formally stated.
These are mandatory payments made by employees and employers to fund the Social Security system, which provides retirement, disability, and survivor benefits.
This word is used in legal documents to introduce the conclusion, agreement, or action that logically follows from the preceding 'WHEREAS' clauses.
This introductory word is used in legal documents to state background information, recitals, or reasons for the agreement that follows.
An agent is a person authorized to act on behalf of another person (the principal) in dealings with third parties.
This comprehensive phrase refers to every single type of tax, charge, or levy that could possibly apply.

terms.term: as of the date first above written
terms.definition: This refers to the effective date of an agreement, which is the date explicitly mentioned at the very beginning of the document.
This phrase is used to introduce and identify the specific parties who are making or entering into an agreement.
This refers to the rule that determines which jurisdiction's laws will be used to interpret a contract or resolve a dispute.

terms.term: commence on the date first written above
terms.definition: This phrase means that the agreement or action will officially start or become effective on the specific date recorded at the very beginning of the document.
This describes information that is private, sensitive, and should not be shared or disclosed to unauthorized parties.
These are legal rules used to decide which jurisdiction's laws should apply when there is a dispute involving legal systems from more than one state or country.
This refers to something that is included or expressed within the contents of the current document.
This phrase means either by direct action or through any roundabout means, including intermediaries or related actions.
This is a type of insurance that provides income replacement benefits to individuals who are unable to work due to an illness or injury.

terms.term: during the term of this Agreement or at any time thereafter
terms.definition: This specifies that a condition or obligation applies throughout the entire period the agreement is in effect, and continues indefinitely even after the agreement has ended.
An employee is an individual hired by an employer to perform work or services, typically under the employer's direction and control, in exchange for wages or salary.
When an agreement or document is executed, it means it has been formally signed by the parties, making it legally valid and effective.

terms.term: governed by and construed in accordance with
terms.definition: This means that the agreement will be interpreted and enforced according to the rules and principles of a specific legal jurisdiction.
This phrase introduces the value, benefit, or service that one party provides to another as the reason for entering into an agreement.
An independent contractor is a self-employed individual or entity hired to perform a specific job or service for a client, without having the legal status of an employee.
A joint venturer is a participant in a temporary business arrangement where two or more parties combine resources for a specific project, sharing in the profits and losses.

terms.term: made and entered into as of
terms.definition: This phrase indicates the specific date on which an agreement was officially created and became legally binding between the parties.
These are the reciprocal agreements and commitments made by each party to a contract, where each party agrees to do or not do certain things.
This refers to something that has already been mentioned or described earlier in the document.
A partner is an individual who shares in the ownership and operation of a business, typically with shared profits, losses, and responsibilities.
These are taxes that employers are required to withhold from employees' paychecks or contribute on behalf of their employees, such as Social Security, Medicare, and unemployment taxes.
This is the primary location where a company's executive offices are situated and where its main business operations are conducted.
This refers to the particular services that have already been described or referenced earlier within the same document.
This refers to the fulfillment of a task or project to an acceptable level of quality or according to specified requirements.
These are confidential business information, such as formulas, practices, designs, instruments, or compilations of information, that provide a business with a competitive edge.
These are taxes paid by employers to government agencies to fund unemployment compensation benefits for eligible workers who lose their jobs.
This means a formal communication or notification that is provided in a tangible written form, such as a letter or email.
